definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
bailing bucket (tool for irrigating fields)/protruding lower jaw
to draw water for irrigation (manually or with a water wheel)

sentences.english: I heard that Brad Pitt is going to be on the Tonight Show tonight.
sentences.chinese: 聽說今晚布萊德彼特會上《傑哥戽斗秀》。

sentences.english: When sending faxes to your clients you should include a cover sheet.
sentences.chinese: 傳真給客戶時，你應該附上廢戽頁。

sentences.english: The canned goods are to be packed in cartons with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 罐裝貨物在紙箱裏，拖戽加兩道箍。

sentences.english: The sailor tried to bail the water out of the sinking boat.
sentences.chinese: 海員們設法把水從那條正在下沉的船裏戽出來。

sentences.english: The boaters bailed water out from their sinking boat.
sentences.chinese: 船工們從正在下沉的船裏往外戽水。

sentences.english: The sailor tried to bail the water out of the sinking boat .
sentences.chinese: 海員們設法把水從那條正在下沉的船裏戽出來。

sentences.english: Given the urgent need to distribute the water, many women took part in the work.
sentences.chinese: 由於時間緊迫，許多婦女也參加了戽水。

sentences.english: A mortice gauge is a special type of marking gauge.
sentences.chinese: 榫鋸是一種特殊的墨線戽。

definition: to draw water for irrigation (manually or with a water wheel)
a basket or pan used for earth, manure etc
bamboo, rattan or wicker basket/sedan chair for mountain use (Cantonese)
stone roller (for threshing grain, leveling ground etc)/Taiwan pr. [du2]
ice spud (aka ice chisel) with a pointy tip/to break a hole in ice (for ice fishing etc) using an ice spud
